Review Text: I recently stayed at this hotel and had an amazing experience! The room was extremely comfortable, with a clean and cozy atmosphere that made me feel right at home. The staff were incredibly friendly and attentive, providing top-notch service that exceeded my expectations, especially @juken. The hotel's restaurant area was also a highlight, with a delicious breakfast menu that offered a variety of options to suit every taste. The ambiance was warm and inviting, making it the perfect spot to start the day. Overall, I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a comfortable and enjoyable stay.

Dirty, rundown, and the food was better from the noodle stall in the car park. Not worth a cent. My first room had torn and stained bedsheets. Second one, which took an hour to arrange, was old and rundown. Whilst the bedsheets were clean they were of a poorer quality than a cheap t-shirt. Now to the restaurant. With me as the one single guest (that was a warning sign I missed) and at least five staff, they managed to heat up some canned soup after almost an hour of waiting. The beef which took another hour went out twice, until I decided to leave, without eating it. My dinner was instead cooked at the noodle stall across the car park. In summary: Dirty, rundown, and a place you should not bother to visit, even if you get it for free.

Menginap di hotel ini untuk dua malam. Pengalamannya cukup menyenangkan. Staff hotelnya sangat ramah dan profesional. Cekatan dalam membantu membawakan luggage yang cukup banyak. Didepan hotel ada beberapa stall makanan dan cafe, ada hypermart juga di gedung sebelahnya yg bisa dijangkau dengan berjalan kaki. Room experience : Kamarnya cukup bersih, tidak berbau, hanya ada sedikit berdebu dibawah ranjang kemungkinan karena susah dijangkau vacuum. Outlet listrik tersedia cukup banyak, 2 outlet international dimeja tv, 1 slot di samping masing-masing bed, 1 slot di dekat coffe table, 1 slot di minibar. ac dingin banget, sayangnya untuk kontrol acnya agak jadul, tidak ada display suhu yg diatur, knobnya juga tidak jelas maksimal dan minimalnya. Jadi kalau sudah kedinginan dimatikan manual dan dinyalakan lagi kalau sudah tidak dingin. Cukup merepotkan. Kulkas minibar tidak ada isinya, jadi bisa diisi dengan jajanan dan minuman yg sudah dibeli sebelumnya. Ada 2 air mineral 600ml gratis tiap harinya. Kamar mandi bersih meski ada sedikit noda air dikaret seal kaca pembatas toilet dan shower yang kaca nya kurang panjang, sehingga cipratan air shower masuk ke area wastafel dan toilet. Yang perlu diperhatikan adalah Lantai shower yang terasa licin bila terkena air, jadi harus berhati-hati. Air panas tersedia di shower dan wastafel. Disediakan perlengkapan mandi dan 2 lembar handuk. Tapi tidak ada mantel handuk. TV sudah led, tp masih belum smart tv sehingga tidak bisa buka youtube di tv. Kasur empuk dan bersih, kamar yg dipesan twin bed namun meja pembatas bed tidak bisa dipindah, sehingga bed tidak bisa disatukan. Fasilitas : Paket kamar yang dipesan gratis masuk kolam dan gym, namun tidak sempat dimanfaatkan karena gym hanya buka dari jam 6 pagi sampai jam 6 sore. Breakfast : Sarapan ala buffet all you can eat, menu yg disajikan beragam dan berbeda tiap harinya. Sarapan buka dari jam 6 sampai jam 10 pagi. Extra person dikenakan charge hanya 65.000. Overall cukup puas menginap disini selain masalah ac dan lantai kamar mandi yang cukup licin.
